item.title: My attempt at hard codeing (i need some help)
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

im trying to hard code my first item but im not that good
so far i came up with this

if(i == 1){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[2]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [2]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 10351; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 22; class8.anIntArray156[1] = 220; class8.anIntArray160[1] = 1934; class8.anInt174 = 2553;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 64; class8.anInt190 = 150; class8.anInt198 = 50; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 1; class8.anInt194 = 1; class8.anInt165 = 33; class8.anInt200 = 91; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Goth Bunny Ears"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Pair of Goth Bunny Ears! OH SNAP!.".getBytes(); }

everything right except for the rotaion and when you wear it you cant see your head
can some one help me out

please dont leech this even tho it sucks alot
